coreAtributes.authorTag: A small tag sewn into the side seam reads "Offical Enforcer Issue, MFD by DSG Threadworks."
coreAtributes.name: Enforcer's commando sweater
coreAtributes.description: A heavily ribbed, crew-neck sweater with hard-wearing fabric panels on the elbows and shoulders. Fortunately for you, someone has lovingly de-itched the wool. The tag on the chest makes it plain who the intended wearer is.

replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(help)] [npc2.name] [npc2.verb(put)] [npc2.her] arms through the commando sweater's sleeves as [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] the rest down over [npc2.her] torso.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(stuff)] [npc2.name] [npc2.verb(put)] [npc2.her] arms into the commando sweater's sleeves as [npc.she] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the rest down over [npc2.her] torso.

displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(grab)] hold of [npc2.namePos] commando sweater and roughly pull it off over [npc2.her] head.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] commando sweater back down over [npc.her] torso.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] commando sweater back down over [npc2.her] torso.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] commando sweater back down over [npc2.her] torso.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] commando sweater up to just below [npc.her] chin.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] commando sweater up to just below [npc2.her] chin.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] commando sweater up to just below [npc2.her] chin.
